fields.title: Bayesian logistic regression
fields.pointers:
* Bayesian logistic regression is intractable to solve exactly. Some approximation methods include:
**  [Laplace approximation](laplace_approximation)
**  [variational Bayes](variational_logistic_regression)
**  [expectation propagation](ep_logistic_regression)
*  [Gaussian process classification](gaussian_process_classification)  is a nonlinear analogue.
fields.summary: A Bayesian version of logistic regression.
